params.about-owner: Piyush Mini Mart is your last destination for your all types of household items. At our place you will get every item at cheap price with high level of quality. We provide every stuff at a very reasonable price. Come check-out once. Our Address: Village - Bachini - Gagarwas Bus Stand, District - Mahendergarh, State - Haryana, India. Contact Details: Owner Name - Piyush Yadav, Contact - 9050204343 Timing: 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM
params.about-dev: My name is Sourabh Kumar. I am from Gagarwas. This website is in test phase right now so there may be many issues in this. Please tell your issues in this website on this email - 'sourabh.kakodia.55@gmail.com'
params.tagline-text: Searching for some Grocery? You are at the right Destination. We provide you the taste out of the best.
params.delivery-charges: Please note that the delivery charges for orders below ₹500 is ₹40 and above ₹500 is ₹20
